nodes.text: Ee mental powers were an inherent ability of the Ee, a species of intelligent invertebrates from the planet Trilos. All members of the Ee were adept in at least one type of mental power, which were divided into three categories; physical skills, environmental skills, and mental skills. One in ten Ee was adept in two categories; one in a hundred Ee were skilled in all three. Each category had a number of different skills.
